Music

All the Sugardrum releases are availble to buy/download from the Sugardrum page on Bandcamp in both electronic and CD format. Many of the songs are also available via iTunes , Spotify etc.

The new album, Postcards is available to buy in a limited edition CD format from the Sugardrum shop. It includes a lyrics booklet and a book of short stories, each one about a song from the album. You can also buy it from iTunes , Amazon mp3 and various other online stores from that date and also stream from Spotify etc.

Click on an album/EP cover to go to the page on Bandcamp .
